# total

**Instance Property**

A line item that represents the total payment.

## Declaration

```swift
ApplePayLineItem total;
```

## Discussion

The total must be a positive number greater than zero. This value is the final amount that the payment request authorizes.

## Payment line items

- **additionalLineItems**: A set of line items that explain additional charges and discounts.

items.description: A set of line items that explain additional charges and discounts.
